message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. This product is truly a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled benefits and value. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it can have on your endeavors, we believe it's worth every penny of its $10,000 value to you. Given this, I kindly propose to sell it to you for $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to ensuring you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the value for us. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
